alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 11:10PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Columbia, Suwannee, Hamilton, Echols, west central Ware and Clinch Counties through MIDNIGHT EST... At 1110 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Mayday to 9 miles east of Perry. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Live Oak, Jasper, Homerville, Jennings, White Springs, Fargo, Argyle, Statenville and Suwannee River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EST for northern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.
